Select Workfile Location

Use this dialog to select the location to which workfiles are to be checked out. Note that if you are selecting a new workfile location for an existing project, project database, folder, or versioned file, only new workfiles will be placed in the new location.

If you delete the workfile location for a project while working in the root workspace, the workfile location for that project will set to the root project database directory.

Field Descriptions

Look in Select a valid drive or path. The contents of the drive or path you select appear in the contents list.
Contents list Double-click to select a directory that contains the workfiles to be checked out. The list displays the directories in the drive or folder selected in the Look in field. Selecting a directory updates the Look in and Folder name fields to reflect the full path name of new location.
Opens the directory one level above the current level. This button is disabled if you are at the top level of a directory.
Creates a new folder in the currently selected directory. You may rename the new folder using in-place editing. The following characters are not allowed in new folder names: \ / : * ? " < > | .
Folder name Use the Look in and Contents list fields to select and display a folder name or enter a path for the workfile location.
